query: CREATE TABLESPACE regress_tblspace LOCATION 'relative'
CREATE TABLESPACE regress_tblspace LOCATION ''
SET allow_in_place_tablespaces = true
CREATE TABLESPACE regress_tblspacewith LOCATION '' WITH (some_nonexistent_parameter = true)
expected: CREATE TABLESPACE regress_tblspacewith LOCATION '' WITH ( some_nonexistent_parameter = 'true' )

query: CREATE TABLESPACE regress_tblspacewith LOCATION '' WITH (random_page_cost = 3.0)
expected: CREATE TABLESPACE regress_tblspacewith LOCATION '' WITH ( random_page_cost = 3.0 )

query: SELECT spcoptions FROM pg_tablespace WHERE spcname = 'regress_tblspacewith'
DROP TABLESPACE regress_tblspacewith
SELECT regexp_replace(pg_tablespace_location(oid), '(pg_tblspc)/(\d+)', '\1/NNN') FROM pg_tablespace  WHERE spcname = 'regress_tblspace'
expected: SELECT regexp_replace(pg_tablespace_location(oid), '(pg_tblspc)/(\d+)', '\1/NNN') FROM pg_tablespace WHERE spcname = 'regress_tblspace'

query: ALTER TABLESPACE regress_tblspace SET (random_page_cost = 1.0, seq_page_cost = 1.1)
expected: ALTER TABLESPACE regress_tblspace SET ( random_page_cost = 1.0, seq_page_cost = 1.1 )

query: ALTER TABLESPACE regress_tblspace SET (some_nonexistent_parameter = true)
expected: ALTER TABLESPACE regress_tblspace SET ( some_nonexistent_parameter = 'true' )

query: ALTER TABLESPACE regress_tblspace RESET (random_page_cost = 2.0)
expected: ALTER TABLESPACE regress_tblspace RESET ( random_page_cost = 2.0 )

query: ALTER TABLESPACE regress_tblspace RESET (random_page_cost, effective_io_concurrency)
expected: ALTER TABLESPACE regress_tblspace RESET ( random_page_cost, effective_io_concurrency )

expected: REINDEX (tablespace) TABLE pg_am

query: ROLLBACK
SELECT c.relname FROM pg_class c, pg_tablespace s WHERE c.reltablespace = s.oid AND s.spcname = 'regress_tblspace'
expected: SELECT c.relname FROM pg_class AS c, pg_tablespace AS s WHERE c.reltablespace = s.oid AND s.spcname = 'regress_tblspace'

query: SELECT relfilenode as main_filenode FROM pg_class WHERE relname = 'regress_tblspace_test_tbl_idx'
expected: SELECT relfilenode AS main_filenode FROM pg_class WHERE relname = 'regress_tblspace_test_tbl_idx'

query: SELECT relfilenode as toast_filenode FROM pg_class WHERE oid = (SELECT i.indexrelid FROM pg_class c, pg_index i WHERE i.indrelid = c.reltoastrelid AND c.relname = 'regress_tblspace_test_tbl')
expected: SELECT relfilenode AS toast_filenode FROM pg_class WHERE oid = (SELECT i.indexrelid FROM pg_class AS c, pg_index AS i WHERE i.indrelid = c.reltoastrelid AND c.relname = 'regress_tblspace_test_tbl')

query: SELECT c.relname FROM pg_class c, pg_tablespace s WHERE c.reltablespace = s.oid AND s.spcname = 'regress_tblspace' ORDER BY c.relname
expected: SELECT c.relname FROM pg_class AS c, pg_tablespace AS s WHERE c.reltablespace = s.oid AND s.spcname = 'regress_tblspace' ORDER BY c.relname

REINDEX (TABLESPACE regress_tblspace, CONCURRENTLY) TABLE tbspace_reindex_part
expected: REINDEX (tablespace) TABLE CONCURRENTLY tbspace_reindex_part

query: SELECT b.relname, CASE WHEN a.relfilenode = b.relfilenode THEN 'relfilenode is unchanged' ELSE 'relfilenode has changed' END AS filenode, CASE WHEN a.reltablespace = b.reltablespace THEN 'reltablespace is unchanged' ELSE 'reltablespace has changed' END AS tbspace FROM reindex_temp_before b JOIN pg_class a ON b.relname = a.relname ORDER BY 1
expected: SELECT b.relname, CASE WHEN a.relfilenode = b.relfilenode THEN 'relfilenode is unchanged' ELSE 'relfilenode has changed' END AS filenode, CASE WHEN a.reltablespace = b.reltablespace THEN 'reltablespace is unchanged' ELSE 'reltablespace has changed' END AS tbspace FROM reindex_temp_before AS b INNER JOIN pg_class AS a ON b.relname = a.relname ORDER BY 1
